conbody.p: The following known issues exist in Eucalyptus 4.1.1 and its dependencies. Please contact Eucalyptus support for known workarounds to these issues.

p.b: New known issues for this release:

entry.p: See linked bug for more information.

row.entry: Unable to launch EBS instance or delete volume when launched in different zone than created. (EUCA-10697)

entry.p: See linked bug for more information.

row.entry: Older imaging worker fails to convert paravirt on 4.1.1 (EUCA-10787)

entry.p: After upgrading from 4.0.2 to 4.1.1 without updating the image worker. Paravirt image conversion fails.
Workaround: See linked bug for more information.
The cloud.vmstate.terminated_time property default value was previously 60 minutes. This time has been reduced to 2 minutes.

row.entry: IAM policy settings/modifications with multiple Resource items are not showing up after save (GUI-1710)

entry.p: After modifying and saving a policy, the modified settings do not show up when viewing the updated policy.
